name: OpenClinic
long_description: OpenClinic is a platform that makes it easy for any doctor or hospital to open their own digital clinic. Our AI assistant takes a comprehensive medical history using an empathic voice-based interface, uses sophisticated medical reasoning to narrow down likely diagnoses, and produces evidence-based treatment suggestions for each patient. Licensed doctors then review the text-based summaries of the cases our AI provides, and choose how to manage the patients. In this fashion, we're able to deliver end-to-end healthcare where AI manages 99%, and doctors do the final high value 1%.
one_liner: Digital healthcare clinics that are 99% AI, 1% doctor.
